import React from 'react'; import './login.css' import logo from '../../src/Images/Salz Logo.jpg' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useState } from 'react'; function Login() { const [email, setEmail] = useState(''); const [password, setPassword] = useState(''); function login(e) { e.preventDefault(); let body = { email: email, password: password, } let data = { mode: 'no-cors', method: 'POST', headers: { 'Accept': 'application/json, text/plain, */*', 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, body: JSON.stringify(body) } console.log('body', body) console.log('data', data) fetch('http://localhost:8080/api/v1/user/login', data).then(response => { console.log('response: ', response) }).catch(error => { console.log('error: ', error) }); } return (
